中文品名: 亞培IMX BETA2-微球蛋白檢驗試劑組

醫器規格: IMx β2-Microglobulin Reagent Pack, 100 Tests      IMx β2-Microglobulin Calibrators      IMx β2-Microglobulin Controls      IMx β2-Microglobulin Specimen Diluent
